subject: Re: Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
msgSnippet: This problem keeps comming up.  Using constructors is good, but how do you tearDown?  Using another Suite is fine, but it means extra work and isn t easy to
messageBody:
This problem keeps comming up. Using constructors is good, but how
do you tearDown? Using another Suite is fine, but it means extra
work and isn't easy to read. Using junit.extension.TestSetup is ok,
but it uses inheritance... what if you need to use another extension?

Since this keeps comming up, someone should add methods to TestCase
that get called once for all tests...

public void setUpOnce();
public void tearDownOnce();

- Greg
